A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The biggest let down of my life. The film was full of inconsistencies from TFA. Major plot holes were created and massive reveals were were tossed aside for no reason. The way Luke was handled was disrespectful to the franchise and completely broke the immersion of the film. I often found myself questioning the team's decisions regarding so many aspects of the film. We were promised the darkest Star Wars yet\, however the film failed to kill off characters that really needed to be removed like Rose\, Finn and Leia. This movie has made Attack Of the Clones look like a masterpiece.
